name: Sumeria
declaringWar: That's enough, prepare to be smashed into the dust!
attacked: You dare to attack a demigod? You will regret this sooner than you think!
defeated: Defeat. A mere mortal emerged victorious. Can't wait to see how long will you last. Even demigods aren't invicible.
introduction: I am Gilgamesh, a demigod who descended to Earth to lead the mighty city of Uruk. Let there be peace among us!
hateLetsHearIt: Just speak, don't waste my time!
afterPeace: Oh, a peace. Maybe we should celebrate it?
tradeRequest: I present you this trade offer.
uniqueText: Additional 3 Science in capital and additional 1 Science in any other city. Cities with access to Fresh water have +2 Food.
uniques: +2 Food in cities with access to Fresh water

name: Israel
attacked: The Lord told me your plans. We are prepared!
defeated: Is this how my peaceful reign ends? In a river of blood and suffering...
introduction: I am Solomon, King of the Chosen People. If you seek justice or advice, know that you had found them.
hateYes: The Lord told me it will be wise to accept this offer.
afterPeace: Praise the Lord as he gives peace!
tradeRequest: I present you this trade offer.
uniqueText: Pastures yield additional 1 Food and 1 Culture. Receive Prophet when you discover Calendar. Prophets are earned 25% faster.

name: Phoenicia
declaringWar: We accept you for no longer!
attacked: I am disappointed. Can't we simply trade and avoid the conflict?
defeated: Yes, take my lands. I doubt you will make any better use of them!
introduction: I am Hiram of Tyre. If you are here to trade, let's go straight into business.
hateYes: This offer is too good to reject.
afterPeace: If we are no longer at war, maybe we should trade?
uniques: Your first 5 coastal cities provide +10% Gold and your choice of +3: Production or Science or Culture or Happiness or Food. Each bonus can be choosen only once.

name: The Hittites
attacked: We would attack you anyway. You are just hastening your defeat
defeated: You were a worthy opponent, but my allies will eventually avenge me.
introduction: I am the mighty Mursilis. Don't get in my way and we shall live in peace.
hateHello: Don't waste much of my time!
hateNo: No one would agree to that. Ever.
hateYes: You can't simply refuse such offer.
uniqueText: Iron and Horses tiles yield additional 1 Gold and 1 Production. Receive +10% Production bonus when constructing military units.

name: Armenia
declaringWar: You are a disgrace to this world and I shall end you!
attacked: So that's how you treat others? We shall teach you a lesson.
defeated: I might perish, but my people will never forget all that suffering you have brought.
introduction: I am the great Tigranes. Welcome to the hills of Armenia. I will now leave and pray for our bright future - If you don't mind.
hateHello: Don't waste much of my time!
hateNo: No one would agree to that. Ever.
hateYes: You can't simply refuse such offer.
afterPeace: We shall now pray for the better days!
tradeRequest: I bring you an excellent offer!
uniqueText: All Mountains yield additional 2 Culture and 1 Happiness. Double quantity of Horses and units ignore terrain cost when moving into any tile with Hills.
uniques: Units ignore terrain costs when moving into any tile with Hills

name: Macrobia
declaringWar: You have had your chance, prepare for war!
attacked: You DARE declare war on us? We shall make you suffer!
defeated: So that is how it all ends. In sea of tears and blood.
introduction: Who are you? I bet You are here to admire our wealth.
hateHello: Don't waste much of my time!
hateNo: No one would agree to that. Ever.
hateYes: You can't simply refuse such offer.
afterPeace: We shall now pray for the better days!
tradeRequest: I bring you an excellent offer!
uniqueText: Earns Gold for killing enemy Land units. Conquered cities yield 15% more Gold and Culture
uniques: Earn [150]% of [Land] opponent's [Strength] as [Gold] for kills

name: Olmec
declaringWar: War! The Feathered Serpent demands blood!
defeated: That's the greatest sacrifice i can offer You!
introduction: Were you send b the great Serpent?
afterPeace: Yes, what such bloodhirsty beast might want?
uniques: Receive 10% bonus toward correspondent Great Person when you build an unique specialist building in your Empire for the first time

name: Nok
attacked: Oh I see. I did not expect anything else from you.
defeated: We might die, but our culture is eternal.
introduction: Welcome to our lands. May there be peace among us!
hateYes: This offer is too good to reject.
uniqueText: All cities provide 1 copy of Terracotta luxury resource. +1 Science from every Iron. Workers may expended to instantly create Mine improvemenet regardless of base terrain
uniques: All cities provide 1 copy of Terracotta luxury resource

name: Himyar
declaringWar: You are an obstacle and you shall be removed!
defeated: Take my lands, but you will never take our pride!
introduction: Welcome to my court. I bet our Incense got you here.
hateYes: This offer is too good to reject.
tradeRequest: I think that's a fair offer.
uniques: May convert Incense to Myrrh or Frankincense luxury resources
+[15]% Strength if within [1] tiles of a [Desert]

name: Epirus
declaringWar: There can be only one king. Prepare for battle!
attacked: I think my emissary must have been late, I already declared war on you!
defeated: You were a worthy opponent. The gods will welcome me!
introduction: Welcome to Epirus, friend. I am king Pyrrhus. Are you an ally... or perhaps a next target of my army?
hateYes: This offer is too good to reject.
afterPeace: Hail, great lord. This was indeed a good fight.
uniqueText: Can't train Settlers. All military units have + 50% more strength when attacking, but suffer -25% penalty when defending. Gain Free Worker whenever you conquer a new city. +50% Production when constructing military units.

name: Scythia
declaringWar: I am afraid your reign is over!
attacked: We will sunk you in your own blood.
introduction: Welcome to the steppes. I am Ateas, the king of the Scythian people.
hateYes: This offer is too good to reject.
